publicationStmt.p: Published as part of ELTE Verskorpusz

div.div_rhyme: abcdefgd abcddaebf abcdcefeghdc abacdefgdhdha abbcdcebacfgbca abcdccdefagadhije abcadefgahaijklmn abcddebcfgcebcbhhdf
div.head: PROMETHEUSZ
div.p: Thou art a symbol and a sign To Mortals of their fate and force; Like thee, Man is in part divine, A troubled stream from a pure source...
